benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

benefits.name: Merge with Shadows
effects: While within Dim Light or Darkness, you can give yourself the Invisible condition as a Bonus Action. The condition ends on you immediately after you take an action, a Bonus Action, or a Reaction.

benefits.name: Shadowy Form
effects: While within Dim Light or Darkness, you have Resistance to all damage except Psychic and Radiant.
